DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate effect pancreatic enzyme steatorrhea HIV patient .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria HIV positive patient clinically stable disease ( Karnofsky Performance Status > 40 ) ; Steatocrit > 2 % ; Females childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test prestudy subject must surgically sterile least 1 year postmenopausal judge investigator ; Women childbearing potential must use medically acceptable method birth control throughout study Exclusion Criteria Known allergy pancreatin history abnormal drug reaction ; Known diagnosis pancreatic exocrine insufficiency due e.g . chronic pancreatitis cystic fibrosis pancreatectomy ; Intake experimental drug within four week prior entry study ; Alcohol abuse within last six month ; Suspected noncompliance noncooperation ; Any lack fitness , investigator 's opinion , participate complete study ; Patients stool fat excretion < = 7 g/day accord van de Kamer runin period
